messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Laundry Rewards
messages.msgSnippet: ...  locking myself in the laundry room(bathroom) sitting ontop of the warm dryer and consuming the entire bag!!!! ...
messages.messageBody:
________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________

>
>>>>>>>>>> Hi all!
> I know you're about to think I'm a total nut, but I
> devised a way to motivate me to keep up on my laundry.
> I keep a bag of hershey kisses in my laundry room.
> Every time I put a load in or take one out, I reward
> myself with chocolate. Yes, it goes against some
> unschooling ideas(ie, no rewards!), but to me, its a
> perfect set up. The laundry gets done and I get
> chocolate. >>>

<<<<What could be better?>>>>>>


locking myself in the laundry room(bathroom) sitting ontop of the warm dryer
and consuming the entire bag!!!!


> Tanya
www.geocitie.com/athomemamaof5/Simpson_Unschoolers.html

"The secret of happiness is this: Let your interests be as
wide as possible, and let your reactions to the things and
persons that interest you be as far as possible friendly
rather than hostile." --Bertrand
Russell_____________________________________________________________________
___
